sentences.en: All four claim that officers fabricated evidence against them.
sentences.cn: 4人全都声称警察捏造证据陷害他们。

sentences.en: Coleman has never wavered in his claim that he is innocent.
sentences.cn: 科尔曼坚称他是无辜的。

sentences.en: Fill in and return the claim form as soon as it arrives.
sentences.cn: 收到索赔申请表后请尽快填妥寄回。

sentences.en: He should be able to claim the price of the ticket back.
sentences.cn: 他应该能够要回票款。

sentences.en: He was too modest to claim the credit.
sentences.cn: 他太谦逊，不愿意邀功。

sentences.en: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.cn: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.en: It would be disingenuous to claim that this is great art.
sentences.cn: 称这是艺术瑰宝是言不由衷。

sentences.en: Ministers can equally credibly claim that the opposition is to blame.
sentences.cn: 部长们也能同样令人信服地宣称，反对派应该受到指责。

sentences.en: Now they are returning to claim what was theirs.
sentences.cn: 现在他们回来索要原本属于他们的东西。

sentences.en: Only the opening sequence could claim to be genuinely innovatory.
sentences.cn: 只有开场片段能称得上是真正的创新。

sentences.en: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.cn: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

sentences.en: Others claim that Ireland's very essence is expressed through the language.
sentences.cn: 其他人声称爱尔兰最精髓的东西是通过语言表现出来的。

sentences.en: Philip feared Edward would lay claim to the Scottish crown.
sentences.cn: 菲利普担心爱德华会主张自己继承苏格兰王位的权利。

sentences.en: Rodgers can also claim four victories in the New York Marathon.
sentences.cn: 罗杰斯也能在纽约马拉松比赛中4次夺冠。

sentences.en: Scientists claim to have identified natural substances with cancer-combating properties.
sentences.cn: 科学家们声称已经发现自然界的某些物质具有抗癌特性。

sentences.en: She laid claim to her father's crown.
sentences.cn: 她根据权利要求继承父亲的王位。

sentences.en: Staff who have to travel farther can claim excess travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 需要到更远的地方出差的职员可以领取额外差旅费。

sentences.en: Television censors are cutting out scenes which they claim may offend.
sentences.cn: 电视节目审查官正在剪掉他们称有可能会令人反感的一些镜头。

sentences.en: the competing claims of parents and teachers
sentences.cn: 家长和教师各执一词的说法

sentences.en: The Maldives pressed its claim to hold the summit.
sentences.cn: 马尔代夫一再要求主办这场峰会。

sentences.en: The situation remains confused as both sides claim success.
sentences.cn: 由于双方均宣称获胜，形势依然不明朗。

sentences.en: the town's only claim to fame is that it is the birthplace of Elgar.
sentences.cn: 小镇所以成名的惟一原因是它是埃尔加的出生地。

sentences.en: There is already a long list of people claiming her attention.
sentences.cn: 已经有太多人需要她的关注了。

sentences.en: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward.
sentences.cn: 他们还声称保安人员将一位乘务员推搡至一边。

sentences.en: They intend to claim for damages against the three doctors.
sentences.cn: 他们打算向那3位医生索要损害赔偿。

sentences.en: They made claims they couldn’t live up to.
sentences.cn: 他们给出了自己无法兑现的断言。

sentences.en: You can claim on the insurance if you have an accident while on holiday.
sentences.cn: 如果度假期间遭遇事故，可向保险公司索赔。

sentences.en: You must claim your prize by telephoning our claims line.
sentences.cn: 您必须通过拨打我们的领奖电话来领取奖品。

words.tran_cn: 原告；[贸易] 索赔人；提出要求者

phrases.tran_cn: 行李认领；领取行李；取行李处
由于损坏而索赔；赔偿损害要求
索赔申请表；催询单；催缺通函
与众不同之处，值得注意之处；成名的原因
未定权益；或有求偿权；附带要求
坚持对…的权利或对…的所有权
剩余权益；[经]剩余索偿权

trans.tran_en: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved
to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

trans.tran_cn: 声称，索取，赢得，需要，夺去（生命）
trans.tran_en: If something or someone claims your attention, they need you to spend your time and effort on them

trans.tran_cn: 声称， 断言； 要求； 索赔
trans.tran_en: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

trans.tran_cn: 声称，断言；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
trans.tran_en: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved
